channel.title: Privacy on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy on Blowfish

item.title: Partials
item.description: Analytics # Blowfish provides built-in support for Fathom Analytics and Google Analytics. Fathom is a paid alternative to Google Analytics that respects user privacy. Fathom Analytics # To enable Fathom Analytics support, simply provide your Fathom site code in the config/_default/params.
